long description: Local Idea to Idea Mobile calls @ 10 p/min --
All Local Mobile calls: 25p/min + Free Dialer Tone (30 Days)  --

Local + STD On net unlimited mins -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable --

Unlimited local + STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable.  --

Unlimited Local + STD Mintues -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Unlimited Local + STD Mintues -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Unlimited local National Mintues -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
